root.name: Drawn: Dark Flight
root.description: StoryTogether with Iris, you will fight against shadows darkness led by the evil king from the first game, Drawn: The Painted Tower, to light Stonebriar’s three beacons. Hinted by the game’s title, Drawn's art and creativity have recently been corrupted. To help Drawn's world you need to complete unfinished sketches artwork, and solve puzzles to light the beacons. Do you have the creativity and intellect to save the kingdom?
